sn22.88:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.88:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā assaji kassapakārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.88:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā assaji upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.88:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.88:4.9: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.88:4.10: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato assajissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.88:4.12: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.88:4.14: sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.88:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā assaji tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.88:5.2: Addasā kho āyasmā assaji bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn22.88:5.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ etadavoca:
sn22.88:5.8: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ etadavoca:
sn22.88:5.9: “kacci te, assaji, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ … pe …
sn22.88:6.3: “Kacci te, assaji, na kiñci kukkuccaṃ na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:6.4: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṃ kukkuccaṃ anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn22.88:6.5: “Kacci pana taṃ, assaji, attā sīlato na upavadatī”ti?
sn22.88:6.6: “Na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn22.88:6.7: “No ce kira taṃ, assaji, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:6.8: “Pubbe khvāhaṃ, bhante, gelaññe passambhetvā passambhetvā kāyasaṅkhāre viharāmi, sohaṃ samādhiṃ nappaṭilabhāmi.
sn22.88:6.9: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhato evaṃ hoti:
sn22.88:6.11: “Ye te, assaji, samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā tesaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhataṃ evaṃ hoti:
sn22.88:7.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, assaji, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.88:7.7: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:7.13: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti … pe …
sn22.88:7.15: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati;
sn22.88:7.16: dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati;
sn22.88:7.17: adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati.
sn22.88:7.18: So kāyapariyantikañce vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:7.19: Jīvitapariyantikañce vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:7.20: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:8.1: Seyyathāpi, assaji, telañca paṭicca, vaṭṭiñca paṭicca, telappadīpo jhāyeyya;
sn22.88:8.2: tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
sn22.88:8.3: Evameva kho, assaji, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:8.4: Jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:8.5: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānātī”ti.
